Storages.getFullPath

機能/意味
Get the complete unified storage name
タイプ
Storagesクラスのメソッド
構文
getFullPath(path)
引数
path 　Specify the storage name that you want to be a complete unified storage name.
戻り値
Complete unified storage name
説明
　Converts the storage name specified by path to a complete unified storage name.
　All redundant path accesses (for example, system/flags/../data/) are compressed.
　Complements if the current media and current folder are not specified.
参照
Storages.getPlacedPath
